title: Arkthemist
description: A decentralized arbitration platform that provides fair, transparent dispute resolution for Web3 applications. Built on Starknet for low-cost, high-throughput arbitration services.

title: Tinder Stock
summary: Tinder-like interface for crypto stock discovery and trading
description: A gamified approach to cryptocurrency portfolio building, using swipe mechanics to help users discover and buy crypto stocks based on their preferences and risk tolerance.

title: NINE
summary: Distributed AI agents that work everywhere with no-code UI
description: Distributed AI agents that work everywhere with no-code UI.

title: Ethereum SSZ Parser
summary: Ethereum Simple Serialization parser for Alpen Labs
description: Internship project at Nethermind involving the conversion of Python-based SSZ serialization logic to Rust for improved performance and memory safety in Ethereum infrastructure.
